iana.template_text:
(registered 2020-10-02, last updated 2020-10-02)

Media type name: application

Media subtype name: clr

Required parameters: None

Optional parameters: None

Encoding considerations: binary

Security considerations: See RFC 8259, section 12 [RFC8259]

Interoperability considerations: None

Published specification: https://www.imsglobal.org/spec/clr/v1p0/

Applications which use this media: CLR is used to exchange 
   comprehensive learner records between applications.

Fragment identifier considerations: None

Restrictions on usage: None

Additional information:

   1. Deprecated alias names for this type: None
   2. Magic number(s): Not applicable
   3. File extension(s): .1clr
   4. Macintosh file type code: TEXT
   5. Object Identifiers: None

General Comments: More information about the CLR standard including 
   and implementation guide can be found at 
   https://www.imsglobal.org/clr.

Person to contact for further information:

   1. Name: Andy Miller
   2. Email: amiller&imsglobal.org

Intended usage: Common

   CLR is used to exchange comprehensive learner records between 
   applications.

Author/Change controller: IMS Global Learning Consortium Inc.
